name: Bob Discovers The Internet
description:
This is a research project that I made to spread awareness about information security among teenagers and its importance.

ControlsBindingsPlayer movementW A S D keys or Arrow keysInteractE keyPress ButtonsLeft Mouse Button

Thanks to Ommtdh for helping out with the art of the game!

Background music from the CanariPack 1BIT asset pack.

By playing this game you are already contributing to the project's research development. Thank you!
